lead_paragraph: France launched an app to alert users to attacks on Wednesday, two days before the Euro 2016 soccer championship gets underway under a state of emergency imposed after militant Islamists struck Paris in November.

headline.print_headline: France Launches Attack Alert App Ahead of Euro 2016
headline.main: France Launches Attack Alert App Ahead of Euro 2016
